item.title: Python Django Software Engineer в RetargetApp, от $2500, Киев
item.description:
Мы продуктовая команда из Киева. Разрабатывает свой продукт в сфере eCommenre, являемся Facebook Marketing Partner. Мы ищем Middle/Senior Python Engineer-а. Человека который владеет опытом в веб разработке на Python, не администратор, но имеет хорошие навыки работы с базами данных и Linux-подобными системами, способен принимать архитектурные решения(БД, API, дизайн приложений) и помогать имплиментаровать их в жизнь. У нас понятный и прозрачный процесс разработки, очень дружественная и открывая команда, понятно сформулированные задачи с продуманным и ясным в деталях дизайном.

Под опытным мы видим инженера владеющего следующими навыками:
— разработка на Python от 3-х лет
— работа с Django или другим веб фреймворком
— владение MySQL или PostgreSQL, умение анализировать и оптимизировать запросы
— написания тестов
— владение Linux-системами и Docker на базвом уровне
— понимание Scrum методологии
— работа в команде full-time

Что реально нужно делать на этой позиции?
— Разрабатывать и поддерживать веб-приложение на Django(API для SPA-приложения)
— Разрабатывать сопровождающие async сервисы и скрипты
— Принимать участие в проектировании дизайна и API приложения и сервисов
— Разрабатывать адимн-часть для приложения
— Писать рабочий понятный поддерживаемый код и тесты к нему

Наш стек: Python3.6, Django, MySQL, Golang(для high-load сервисов), ES6, ReactJS/Redux.

Какие перспективы?
— Technical lead, CTO, опцион

Предложение фул-тайм в офисе на Воздвиженке.

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Python/Django Developer в Django Stars, Киев
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

— Практический опыт разработки web приложений от 3 лет;
— Уверенное и глубокое знание Python и стандартной библиотеки;
— Уверенное и всеобъемлющее знание Django в целом и всех составных частей в частности;
— Понимание принципов и основ работы Web (HTTP, REST, WebSockets);
— Опыт работы с сопутствующими технологиями и инструментами (Celery, ElasticSearch, Redis, memcached);
— Опыт и глубокие познания в принципах и проблемах отладки, кеширования, производительности;
— Понимание принципов работы ORM, оптимизации запросов, работе с базой данных на более глубоком уровне;
— Опыт работы с Django REST framework;
— Отличное владение Git;
— Отличное знание Linux;
— Опыт написания различных (unit, functional, acceptance, etc) тестов;
— Разговорный английский;

Будет плюсом

— Знакомство с Frontend (JS, CSS, HTML);
— Работа с asyncio;
— Знакомство с Ansible, Docker;
— Знакомство с NoSQL решениями;
— Опыт настройки и тюнинга Nginx, uwsgi, PostgreSQL, HAProxy, Varnish, Docker, etc;
— Опыт работы с отличными от Django фреймворками на Python;
— Знакомство с Agile/Scrum.

Предлагаем

Работу за деньги на интересных проектах.
Сильную команду, здоровую атмосферу.
Обмен опытом, профессиональное развитие.
Гибкий график и офис возле метро.

О проекте

Django Stars is looking for experienced Python/Django Developer to build large-scale highload web app from scratch with modern technology stack.

item.title: Senior Full Stack (Django + Angular) Developer в MWDN, Киев, Харьков
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

MWDN company is looking for a self-motivated and goal oriented Senior Full Stack (Django + Angular) Developer who would like to be a part of a team working on brand new startup projects for foreign customers.

Requirements
4+ years experience with Python/Django
2+ years experience with AngularJS
Ability to do technical implementation design
SQL knowledge
English: upper-intermediate, both oral and writing
Experience of direct communication with client
Be a great partner for your team members

Будет плюсом

Will be a plus
6+ years experience with Webstack applications development
Ability to do technical implementation design
Comfortable collaborating with HTML/CSS specialists to develop complete front-end features
Experience working with GIT, Celery. Redis, MongoDB, RabbitMQ and AWS
Experience with e-commerce, erp, accounting, payment and/or big data
BSc in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject

Предлагаем

We offer
Working with worldwide names (like BMW, Gett, McKesson) and technical startups with challenging tasks
People-oriented management without bureaucracy
Friendly climate inside the company — previous employees have come back often
Flexible working hours
Business trips to customers
100% paid sick leave
Office near Naukova with own parking
Free English courses
Paid participating in the sports events, own basketball court
Educational budget
Salary above the market

Обязанности

Expectations
Being an active and enthusiastic part of the team that will be looking to contribute to our mission and strategy, happy to share the craziest ideas.
Constantly adding value to experience of our customers by writing readable, testable and scalable code.
Taking the time to deeply understand the problems and challenges users face and being the part of the solution finding process.

О проекте

About the project
Yumble is a weekly subscription service that delivers healthy, delicious fully-prepared meals specifically designed for kids.
Yumble solves the biggest daily problem parents face: putting healthy food on the table (or in lunch boxes!) that kids actually want to eat.
Yumble is the fastest growing kids meal company in the US. The NY Post and others have described our direct-to-consumer meals as Happy Meals for a generation of parents who care about healthy eating and free delivery.
Yumble founders include a Harvard Business School grad and the COO and Co-founder of HelloFresh US, and our investors include some of the most prominent tech and food venture capitalists in the country.
Yumble has been covered in TechCrunch, The New York Post, Us Weekly, among many other parenting and business publications.

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Python/Django Web Developer в Preply, Киев
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

We are currently searching for a Python/Django Web Developer experienced, passionate about vision and idea of our product. Working with our fast growing team will be challenging, but will definitely deliver countless opportunities of your technical skills development.

This person will join our one of our product or back-end teams and will help to create exceptional learning experience for our students and tutors. This role will require tight cooperation with all team members to make sure we all go in the same winning direction.

Our Django developers work on all parts of our system from the improving of UX, to making our API more robust, by integrating with 3rd party apps, working on performance optimization, integrating state-of-the-art technologies loke GraphQL/AWS Lambda and much more. We have diverse technical challenges that will allow you to develop your skills across the stack.

Your competency profile:
• At least 2+ years experience developing web applications.
• Strong knowledge of Python.
• Experience with Django web-framework is advantage.
• Web services/API experiences.
• AWS experience is an additional strength.
• Basic knowledge of JavaScript.
• Knowledge of the following web services will be a plus: Celery, Tastypie, PyTest,
Nginx, DevOps.
• Strong communication skills.
• Min. B2 English level (company gives 200$/month for studying English on
Preply.com).

Предлагаем

We offer:
• Cool tech stack: React/Redux/Apollo/GraphQL/Django/Python/Docker/AWS.
• Working in a start-up business, being part of Silicon Valley Environment.
• Great team of A-players.
• Awesome product that helps people learn more and faster.
• Agile development process (we work in product squads, deliver updates daily).
• Official income, 21 working days of vacation, paid sick leaves, 2 remote days a month.
• The company with world-class investors (including booking.com co-founder).
• International team (we have native speakers of different languages on the board).
• Flat interpersonal structure with no bureaucracy.

Обязанности

Your expected outcomes:
• Being an active and enthusiastic part of the team that will be looking to contribute to our mission and strategy, happy to share the craziest ideas.
• Constantly adding value to experience of our customers by writing readable, testable and efficient code.
• Being able to develop back-end and database driven features using Python language and Django frameworks.
• Taking the time to deeply understand the problems and challenges users face and being the part of the solution finding process.

To make a long story short, if you want to join another big story like Booking.com, Airbnb, Uber, Spotify, etc, do not hesitate to contact us and let’s have a conversation.

О проекте

Preply is a fast growing IT product company at an early stage of development, backed by Europe’s most prominent investors. 90+ people are currently working on building a global human-to-human online tutoring marketplace with locations in Kyiv and Berlin.

Our team of more than 15+ nationalities onboard works in squads and practises continuous scaling. We offer remote working days and possibility to use our platform for studying. We challenge each other to learn more and faster, while promoting creative power and free will. Personal growth, friendly and hierarchy-free atmosphere is guaranteed!

We generate trust within and are able to make real impact on the company. Openness, high-speed and global mindset are the main characteristics of our people. Our goal is to make Preply a leading platform in online tutoring and inspire people from all over the world to learn faster!

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Python/Django developer в SteelKiwi, Одесса, Винница
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

Who we are.

SteelKiwi is a US outsourcing company with two development centers in two beautiful Ukrainian cities: Odessa and Vinnytsia. Our products are modern mobile and web applications. We use Python/Django stack as a core of web development and all possible front-end tools to make our products shine.
We are always looking to expand our team with people who share the same passion for delivering the best results and for resting together after the effective performance. Are you ready?

What do we need?

— experience with Python and Django not less than 2 years
— good knowledge of OOP
— experience with MySQL, PostgreSQL
— knowledge of HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript/jQuery
— experience with Git
— experience with *nix systems
— good knowledge of Celery, RabbitMQ, MongoDB
— experience in API development with Django-rest-framework
— English (intermediate)

Our Benefits:

— talented colleagues with a good sense of humor
— the exchange of experience
— the feeling of the importance of what you do
— growth prospects for this position
— free of charge English classes, paid events attendance
— purchase the necessary software, release-party, pizza-party
— periodic review of the salary every six months
— purchase a laptop or PC

We believe that work can be a pleasure, so we are waiting for someone who shares our views.

Interview stages:

Stage 1. Interview with HR (Skype or in person, if you want to see our office).
Stage 2. Interview with the head of the department (Tech Lead).
Stage 3. Interview with founder of the company

And then we make a decision within 5 days (approximately).

If you`ve found yourself in these lines — we are looking forward your CV.

О проекте

SteelKiwi Inc. — американська аутсорсингова компанія, що надає послуги з розробки вебсайтів та мобільних додатків, UI/UX дизайну та тестування. Працюємо з ринками Сполучених Штатів, Європи та Середнього Сходу.

Маємо 2 девелопмент-офіси в Україні (Вінниця, Одеса) та представництва в Словаччині, Нідерландах та Ізраїлі. Спеціалізуємося на повному циклі розробки програмного забезпечення та digital-продуктiв.

Откликнуться на вакансию

Будет плюсом

— use python asyncio, aiohttp, tornado or flask
— understanding how to build QuerySets efficiently (no 3000 queries per page)
— experience working with highload projects
— you can do some frontend stuff or at least understand how React.js works
— experience with Golang

Предлагаем

— We have family environment;
— Freedom through responsibility approach;
— Agile workload;
— Geek spirit;
— Passion for technology excellence;
— Comfortable office in the heart of the city center;

Обязанности

— Participates in weekly/bi-weekly grooming meeting. Contributes and participates in the estimation of described tickets (TL is responsible but dev also participates)
— Develops tasks assigned by TL and prioritized by PM. Aims to complete a task in full within estimate.
If CI checks are NOT OK — the developer is responsible to fix the problem and make another PR to master
— Fixes the code following review and possible comments from Team Lead (or CTO).
— Fixes possible bugs following QA checks.
— We expect the developer to communicate to PM&TL if there is a risk of delay to the task and ask for help in this situation.
— Participates in Daily Stand Up meetings for all projects that he develops.
— Participates in Retrospective meetings on the last day of Sprint and provides feedback to the team.
— Can sometimes participate in meeting with clients

О проекте

USA LAND SALES AUTOMATION PROJECT
— CRM System Client
— REST API

Откликнуться на вакансию

— Redis
— MongoDB
— RabbitMQ
— Django Channels

Предлагаем

— in-office or remote position with a flexible daily schedule
— competitive salary
— Social Package and bunch of bonuses
— interesting and dynamic projects
— good team and well-organized management processes
— regular career opportunities

Обязанности

— develop and deploy high-quality Python/Django websites
— on time and on budget

О проекте

We create digital marketing tools (AdTech and MarketingTech niches) for our clients from US and Western Europe. Some projects are long-term while others take just 3-6 months. Thus you’ll always have a chance to try different technologies and projects.

To apply, please, send your cv to hr@softformance.com

item.title: Программист Python/Django в PixelTeh, $1000–3000, Запорожье
item.description:
Необходимые навыки

В крупную компьютерную фирму (г. Запорожье) в связи с расширением деятельности, на постоянную работу требуется Python/Django программист.

Основные требования:

— Python, ООП и понимание паттернов проектирования

— Опыт работы с Django, Tornado, Twisted, Flask, Django REST

— Реляционные базы данных (PostgreSQL, MySQL), хорошее знание SQL

— RabbitMQ, Celery, Redis, MongoDB

— HTML5/CSS3, SASS/LESS, Javascript

— Опыт работы с Angular, React, Ember или Backbone будет плюсом

— REST/SOAP, опыт реализации собственных API

— Интеграция с платёжными системами (PayPal, Stripe), соц. сетями, Google Maps, Twilio

— Git/SVN, Linux—администрирование

— Опыт использования сервисов AWS/Heroku, работы с Docker/Vagrant

— Оптимизации высоконагруженных проектов будет плюсом

— Базовое знание английского

Предлагаем

— Работу над интересными проектами

— Дружный молодой коллектив

— Высокую оплату труда

— Премии

— Пятидневную рабочую неделю, 8 часов в день

— Помощь в переезде в Запорожье для иногородних (оплата проезда, помощь в поиске жилья);

Откликнуться на вакансию

item.title: Python/Django Developer в Icemint Media, от $1000, Запорожье
item.description:
Необходимые навыки
